name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast
display_help: Masters of light, energy and matter, Peacebringers can manipulate Kheldian Light Energy to devastate their opponents. Their Luminous Blasts bombard their foes with awesome power that often knock down foes and can easily reduce a target's defenses.

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Gleaming_Bolt
powers.display_help: A very quick, but low damage bolt of Kheldian energy that can reduce a target's Defense. This power can be used while in Dwarf form, although only at a reduced range. While in dwarf form, this power will inflict a stronger Defense debuff, in addition to taunt its target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Glinting_Eye
powers.display_help: You can emit a beam of Kheldian energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage and reducing a target's Defense. This power can be used while in Nova form at an increased range and with higher damage but slower recharge. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Gleaming_Blast
powers.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Gleaming Bolt. Gleaming Blast sends a focused blast of Kheldian energy at a foe that can knock them back and reduce their Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 10.00% chance for 1.9 magnitude knock on target
10.00% chance for 1.9 magnitude knock on target
-18.00% strength to defense for 6s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Bright_Nova
powers.display_help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Peacebringer can transform into a flying energy beast known as a Bright Nova. When you choose this power, you will have access to 4 very powerful ranged attacks that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in Bright Nova form. Bright Nova can fly, has increased Accuracy, and improved Endurance Recovery, but has no defense. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 45.00% strength to smashing damage, energy damage for 2s on self
15.00% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 2s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Bright_Nova_Bolt
powers.display_help: A very quick, but low damage bolt of Kheldian energy that can reduce a target's defense. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -9.00% strength to defense for 3s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Bright_Nova_Blast
powers.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Bright Nova Bolt. Bright Nova Blast sends a focused blast of Kheldian energy at a foe that can knock him back and reduce his defense. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 10.00% chance for 1.9 magnitude knock on target
10.00% chance for 1.9 magnitude knock on target
-18.00% strength to defense for 6s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Bright_Nova_Scatter
powers.display_help: Bright Nova Scatter sends bolts of Kheldian light energy to multiple targets at once within a cone area in front of the caster. Bright Nova Scatter deals moderate energy damage to each affected target and reduces their defense. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: -9.00% strength to defense for 8s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Bright_Nova_Detonation
powers.display_help: You hurl a large blast of Kheldian light energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target, reducing their defense. Some affected targets may get knocked back. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

display_info: -9.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
50.00% chance for 3.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 3.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Radiant_Strike
powers.display_help: The Radiant Strike is a slow melee attack, but makes up for it with superior damage. Radiant Strike releases Kheldian light on impact, which can Knock Back foes, bring down fliers, and reduce a target's Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -9.00% strength to defense for 6s on target
60.00% chance for 2.0 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 2.0 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Proton_Scatter
powers.display_help: Proton Scatter sends bolts of Kheldian energy to multiple targets at once within a cone area in front of the caster. Proton Scatter deals moderate Energy damage to each affected target and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: -9.00% strength to defense for 8s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as increasing your chance to hit. Light continues to burn from within you for 30 seconds, giving you a lingering damage and ToHit buff after the initial burst fades. Recharge: Long

display_info: 72.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self
28.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on self

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Luminous_Detonation
powers.display_help: You hurl a large blast of Kheldian energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target, and reducing their Defense. Some affected targets may get knocked back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Incandescent_Strike
powers.display_help: Incandescent Strike is an absolutely devastating melee attack that focuses all of the Kheldian's energy and strength into a single massive blow. This slow but incredibly devastating attack can knock out most opponents, leaving them Held. Incandescent Strike can also bring down fliers, Knock Down foes, and reduce their Defense. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
-9.00% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Pulsar
powers.display_help: Generates a brilliant pulse of Kheldian light around you that stuns nearby foes. Affected foes are Disoriented and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 50.00% chance for 1.0 stun for 13.41s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Glowing_Touch
powers.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally at moderate range. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Solar_Flare
powers.display_help: You channel the might of your Kheldian energy into the very Earth itself. The ground erupts and cracks with luminous energy, blasting all nearby foes, knocking them back and reducing their Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

display_info: 80.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target
80.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target
-18.00% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Photon_Seekers
powers.display_help: You manifest 3 spheres of light from your Kheldian essence. These spheres will follow you until they detect an enemy target. The Photon Seekers will then zero in on their targets and detonate on impact. The explosion is small but devastating and may affect multiple foes if they are near the target. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Summon Drones: Ranged Special, High DMG(Energy)

powers.name: Peacebringer_Offensive.Luminous_Blast.Dawn_Strike
powers.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of Kheldian energy, sending nearby foes flying and reducing their defense. Dawn Strike deals massive damage to all nearby foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

display_info: -18.00% strength to defense for 20s on target
